TARGET.DESCRIPTION: This table holds only MED-D, model XMD claims, and the Med-D associated dollar fields for each claim processed through the APC process. This table should only hold 6 quarters at a time. The Informatica process built to insert rows into it (runs with APC Process) should clean up the oldest quarter just prior to inserting a new. Installed on 3/17/2011 with the Med-D Phase 2 project.
TARGET.NAME: TAPC_DETAIL_MEDD_AMTS

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The Period ID for the quarter, in the format of 2011Q# where # is the quarter number 1-4. Join this value to the TAPC_CLAIMS_DETAIL PERIOD_ID.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: PERIOD_ID

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: The CLAIM_GID for the GDX claim. Join this value to the TAPC_CLAIMS_DETAIL CLAIM_GID. Same as the GDX RCIT_BASE_CLM_INV CLM_GID field.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: CLAIM_GID

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Ins Plan amt for the Deductible stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PLAN_DED_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Ins Plan amt for the Initial Coverage Limit stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PLAN_ICL_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Ins Plan amt for the GAP stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts. If there is an amount here, there should be a value in the BCI-CIE CLM_GAP_PCT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PLAN_GAP_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Ins Plan amt for the Catastrophic stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PLAN_CSTR_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Patient amt for the Deductible stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PTNT_DED_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Patient amt for the Initial Coverage Limit stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PTNT_ICL_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Patient amt for the GAP stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts. If there is an amount here, there should be a value in the BCI-CIE CLM_GAP_PCT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PTNT_GAP_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D dollar Patient amt for the Catastrophic stage. A Med-D claim can span multiple benefit stages, so there may be other Med-D dollar amounts.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_PTNT_CSTR_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D total field for the Deductible stage. Should be equal to the BNSTG_PLAN_DED_AMT + BNSTG_PTNT_DED_AMT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_DRUG_COST_DED_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D total field for the Initial Coverage Limit stage. Should be equal to the BNSTG_PLAN_ICL_AMT + BNSTG_PTNT_ICL_AMT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_DRUG_COST_ICL_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D total field for the GAP stage. Should be equal to the BNSTG_PLAN_GAP_AMT + BNSTG_PTNT_GAP_AMT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_DRUG_COST_GAP_AMT

TARGETFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Med-D total field for the Catastrophic stage. Should be equal to the BNSTG_PLAN_CSTR_AMT + BNSTG_PTNT_CSTR_AMT.
TARGETFIELD.NAME: BNSTG_DRUG_COST_CSTR_AMT

TARGETINDEX.DESCRIPTION: MDQ on Period ID to allow for fast deletes, and joins to the TAPC_DETAIL_* tables.
TARGETINDEX.NAME: SQL101215123332610

TARGETINDEX.DESCRIPTION: Duplicates allowed via the DB index, although that should never occur. Use to join to the TAPC_DETAIL_* tables.
TARGETINDEX.NAME: APC_DTL_MEDD_UX1
